title: Im gold so i get lane and im laging
body:
so I was just in a normal game today and this gold player tried to take lane after I had called it now here is the thing it dose not mater what rank you are how good you are I don't care if you are faker and wont mid but I got it you don't take now I would of given this gold player top as he was jg if he had just asked after this in game he fed top as in he went top for a gank and went for a tower dive now just because you did not get your lane dose not mean you can feed.

Now this is a thing now iv been in so many games were someone will feed and say soz im lagging because they did not get there role now before you say well maybe they were lagging there is this magic thing called custom it takes 2 min to make a game and see ow I have 1k ping witch means that no one can complain about lag I do it wen I get on even tho my ping sits on 30 all the time so plz don't be a dick and check your dam ping before you go into a game.

replies.body: You need to learn some grammar.

iv been trying but I came from china befor here and I have only just started to speak English let alone use grammar.
so im truly sorry if I have offended you.
95% of what this guy posts is unreadable. You actually start to find it funny at a certain point.
